DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety and efficacy of long-term use of Duodopa in patients with Parkinson's disease in actual usage
DOC.brief_title: Special Drug Use-results Survey of Duodopa Enteral Solution in Patients With Parkinson's Disease
DOC.criteria: 1. Patients with Parkinson's disease using Duodopa for the purpose of improving circadian change (wearingoff phenomenon) of symptoms of Parkinson's disease in which sufficient effect cannot be obtained with existing drug therapy including levodopacontaining drugs.
